name: Gravity Trap
description:
On a spacecraft in deep outer space, an AI droid takes care of the human passengers that are currently in cryostasis. One day, there is a security breach and the ship undergoes a surprise alien invasion. Now it’s up to you, the android caretaker of the ship, to defeat the enemies that threaten the safety of all of the passengers of that ship. 

----------------------------------------------

Controls:

-Use the mouse to aim the character's direction

-Use left-click to launch. 

-Use WASD to move along the surface you are on

-Launch toward walls to switch from your current direction of gravity to one that is perpendicular to the surface landed on. 

-Collide with the stomp enemies to defeat them.

-Trace around the regular enemies to defeat them.

-Avoid touching or tracing around the bomb enemies.
